comments.author: xtests
comments.body: Your site seems to be broken by the intermediary called "Cloudflare":It won't let me use it even if I click the "Verify you are human" checkbox. Please consider a proper configuration of that third-party reverse-proxy you are currently using. My IP address belongs to a Tor exit node, just in case it helps you to resolve this accessibility issue on your site. This is mainly because I don't wish to reveal my real IP address to you, your server and the intermediary data-collection network you are using (Cloudflare).Also, is there any way to use your site anonymously or your plan is to collect all the users IP addresses and metadata in order to collaborate with the law enforcement in the future?I didn't find any .onion or I2P link in your announcement.
